venue.name: The Tavern in the Square then University Hall at Lesley University

item.description:
Join the best Fashion Industry Meetup in the world. We have members who are experts in different aspects of the industry, & many who are beginners looking for help from the more experienced members. We have fun, great networking time, and projects to get involved in.

Our current project is a Fashion Expo, "Let's Wake Up the World to the Boston Fashion Industry", Sept. 18, at Lesley University, as a part of Boston Fashion Week, & as our Sept. Meetup.
If you google this use 1815 Masschusetts Ave Cambridge ma not mass ave. Using Mass ave returns a wrong location in cambridge.

We need all types of fashion workers & entrepreneurs to join us. We have many vendors who will have table/booths for showing and selling their fashion products & services. The booth/table area is in the Atrium of University Hall. Panel discussions will be in the amphitheater and there will be workshops in the classrooms.

You should attend if you are interested in fashion, modeling, photography etc. The event will be fun as well as very educational. You will learn a great deal about the Boston Fashion Industry history, current conditions and how to navigate the maze to become successful here.

Attendees can come for the entire event or drop in when you want. A schedule of the panel discussions and workshops and a list of vendors will be put up on the message board soon.

Look forward to seeing you all there.

Boston Fashion Industry Meetup organizers
item.how_to_find_us: Come to the atrium on the second floor
item.name: The Boston Fashion Industry September Meetup
